items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

blocks.name: Fear Aura
blocks.text: Any creature hostile to [name] that starts its turn within 20 feet of [name] must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless [name] is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to [name]'s Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

blocks.name: Magic Resistance
blocks.text: [name] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

blocks.name: Innate Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[name]'s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC sdc[cha]). [name] can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: *detect magic*, *fireball*
3/day each: *hold monster*, *wall of fire*

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[4d6 + str] piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes dmg[6d6] poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

blocks.name: Claw
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d8 + str] slashing damage.

blocks.name: Mace
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d6 + str] bludgeoning damage plus dmg[6d6] fire damage.

blocks.name: Tail
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[3d10 + str] bludgeoning damage.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
